food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me!
💛 My skin is the color of the sun.
😋 I'm a sweet and healthy treat.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or pour me on cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from an animal on a farm.
🥛 I'm good for your bones.
🥣 You can pour me on your breakfast.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree!
❤️ I can be red, green, or yellow.
🍎 A healthy fruit.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bunnies love me!
🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🧡 I'm a healthy snack that's orange.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. You can make a sandwich with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 I am often used to make sandwiches.
🌾 I am made from grains.
🔥 I am baked to be cooked.

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 😭 I can make you sad when you cut me.
🧅 I have many layers.
😋 I add flavor to many meals.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 My skin is fuzzy like a bear.
🥝 I am small and oval-shaped.
💚 My inside is green with tiny black seeds.

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that grows in bunches. I'm often used to make juice or jelly. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in a group!
🥤 You can make juice with me.
❤️ I am a popular sweet and juicy fruit.

food.question: I am a plant with green leaves that you can eat in a salad, and I'm a favorite food of turtles. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 You can put me in a salad.
🐢 Turtles like to eat me!
🥬 I am a green leafy vegetable.

food.question: I am a yellow fruit covered in spikes. My taste is both sweet and sour.

hints.text: 🍍 You can find me in tropical countries.
🍹 I'm a common flavour for drinks.
💛 I have a rough outer texture.

plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I help give you air to breathe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I'm often green and grow tall.
☀️ Birds like to build nests in me.
💨 I sway in the wind.

plant.question: I am small and green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am often found in fields and parks.
⚽️ You can play on me.
🐄 Animals eat me to stay healthy.

plant.question: I have a bright color and a sweet smell. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in a garden.
🐝 I attract buzzing insects.
💐 People give me as gifts.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves me!
👀 I'm good for your eyes.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and am green or purple. You can eat me as a snack or make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 I can be used to make a drink for grown-ups (not you!).
🐒 Monkeys eat me too.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit with a green rind and red inside. I am very refreshing on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am mostly water.
🏖️ You eat me at the beach.
⚫ I have black seeds inside.

plant.question: I have a brown trunk, green leaves, and I give you acorns. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels love to bury my seeds.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
💪 I can grow very tall and strong.

plant.question: I am a green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 Parents want you to eat me.
🦖 I look like a dinosaur's snack.
⚪ I can be dipped in ranch.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People love to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You add butter and salt to me.
🌽 I come from a corn plant.
🔥 I need heat to become what people love.

plant.question: I am a plant whose seed makes a white drink that some people put in their coffee. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am not a cow.
☕️ I am used in lattes and cappuccinos
🌾 The seed comes from the earth like wheat
